---
title: "Basic R"
author: "Tony Duan"

execute:
  warning: false
  error: false
format:
  html:
    toc: true
    toc-location: right
    code-fold: show
    code-tools: true
    number-sections: true
    code-block-bg: true
    code-block-border-left: "#31BAE9"
---


![](images/R_logo.svg.png){width="300"}

# work with file

## get current directory


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
getwd()
```
:::


## get all file name under current directory


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
list.files()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "1 basic R_files"               "1 basic R.qmd"                
[3] "1 basic R.rmarkdown"           "1-basic-R.rmarkdown"          
[5] "5 R boook.qmd"                 "6 data analytic in R book.qmd"
[7] "hotels.csv"                    "images"                       
```


:::
:::


## get file info


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
file.info("6 data analytic in R book.qmd")
```
:::


## create folder


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dir.create('testing_folder')
```
:::


## delete folder/file


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
file.remove('testing_folder')
```
:::


## copy file


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(fs)
file_copy('test.csv', 'test2.csv')
```
:::


## download file from internet


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
url="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-02-11/hotels.csv"

download.file(url = url, destfile = "hotels.csv")
```
:::


# Condition with if/elif/else


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
x <- -5
if(x > 0){
print("Non-negative number")
} else {
print("Negative number")
}
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "Negative number"
```


:::
:::


# Loop

## for Loop


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
for (x in 1:4) {
  print(x)
}
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 1
[1] 2
[1] 3
[1] 4
```


:::
:::


## while Loop


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
i <- 1
while (i < 6) {
  print(i)
  i <- i + 1
}
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 1
[1] 2
[1] 3
[1] 4
[1] 5
```


:::
:::


with break statement


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
i <- 1
while (i < 6) {
  print(i)
  i <- i + 1
  if (i == 4) {break}
}
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 1
[1] 2
[1] 3
```


:::
:::


# function

## without Arguments


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
my_function <- function() { 
  print("Hello World!")
}

my_function()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "Hello World!"
```


:::
:::


## return result


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
adding_ten <- function(x) { 
  a=x+10
  return(a)
}

adding_ten(5)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 15
```


:::
:::


# Package

## check R version


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
version
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
               _                           
platform       aarch64-apple-darwin20      
arch           aarch64                     
os             darwin20                    
system         aarch64, darwin20           
status                                     
major          4                           
minor          3.1                         
year           2023                        
month          06                          
day            16                          
svn rev        84548                       
language       R                           
version.string R version 4.3.1 (2023-06-16)
nickname       Beagle Scouts               
```


:::
:::


## install R package

from The Comprehensive R Archive Network(cran).<https://cran.r-project.org/>

![](images/1_wcX2tfGe4til0PmjxhKuQA.png){width="300"}


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
install.packages('tidyverse')
```
:::


## check one package version


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
packageVersion("tidyverse")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] '2.0.0'
```


:::
:::


## check current loaded package


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sessionInfo()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
R version 4.3.1 (2023-06-16)
Platform: aarch64-apple-darwin20 (64-bit)
Running under: macOS Sonoma 14.1.1

Matrix products: default
BLAS:   /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.3-arm64/Resources/lib/libRblas.0.dylib 
LAPACK: /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.3-arm64/Resources/lib/libRlapack.dylib;  LAPACK version 3.11.0

locale:
[1] en_US.UTF-8/en_US.UTF-8/en_US.UTF-8/C/en_US.UTF-8/en_US.UTF-8

time zone: Asia/Shanghai
tzcode source: internal

attached base packages:
[1] stats     graphics  grDevices utils     datasets  methods   base     

loaded via a namespace (and not attached):
 [1] htmlwidgets_1.6.4 compiler_4.3.1    fastmap_1.1.1     cli_3.6.2        
 [5] tools_4.3.1       htmltools_0.5.7   rstudioapi_0.15.0 yaml_2.3.8       
 [9] rmarkdown_2.25    knitr_1.45        jsonlite_1.8.8    xfun_0.42        
[13] digest_0.6.35     rlang_1.1.3       evaluate_0.23    
```


:::
:::


## check all package version


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ip = as.data.frame(installed.packages()[,c(1,3:4)])
ip = ip[is.na(ip$Priority),1:2,drop=FALSE]
head(ip)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
              Package Version
abind           abind   1.4-5
anytime       anytime   0.3.9
archive       archive   1.1.7
arrow           arrow  15.0.1
askpass       askpass   1.2.0
assertthat assertthat   0.2.1
```


:::
:::


## check package install loaciton


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
.libPaths()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "/Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.3-arm64/Resources/library"
```


:::
:::
